manifest.name: array-includes
manifest.description: An ES7/ES2016 spec-compliant `Array.prototype.includes` shim/polyfill/replacement that works as far down as ES3.

scripts.tests-only: es-shim-api --bound && npm run --silent test:shimmed && npm run --silent test:module
scripts.lint: npm run --silent jscs && npm run --silent eslint
